actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain changes in the loan and purchase program for the 1973 peanut crop which the Department of Agriculture is contemplating shall not be made.

summary.text: Provides that in the administration of the crop loan and purchase program for peanuts for the 1973 calendar year, no change shall be made in such program as it was administered for the 1972 peanut crop, which has any of the following results: (1) eliminating the sheller purchase program; or (2) making peanuts with visible aflatoxin content ineligible for full price supports.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain changes in the loan and purchase program for the 1973 peanut crop which the Department of Agriculture is contemplating shall not be made.
